item.title: Web UI for testing dissect patterns
item.description: If you have been using Filebeat to ship your logs around (usually to Elasticsearch) you know that Filebeat doesn’t support Grok patterns (like Logstash does). Instead, Filebeat advocates the usage of the dissect processor. A small CLI tool for local pattern testing is also available now. Releases are available in the Github Releases page. After downloading and decompressing the .tar.gz file the CLI can be executed as:
